titleStmt.title: SII 7.760: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 760. (A.R. No. 136 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE DEVANAYAKA-PERUMAL SHRINE AT TIRUVENDIPURAM, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅkac cayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ vaḷara mala
rmakaḷ puṇara Urimaaiyiṟ ciṟaṉta maṇimuṭi cūṭi villavar kulaitara mina
var nilaikeṭa vikkalaṉ ciṅkaṇaṉ melkaṭal pāya tikkaṉait
tuṉ taṉ cakranaṭātti vijayābhiṣekam paṇṇi vīrasiṁhāsana
ttu puvanamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya tribhuvanaccakravattikaḷ
śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 2Āvatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu somakrā
ṇaElvaiyil perumāḷ kāvaṉūr maṭattile Eḻun=taruḷiyirukka piḷḷaiyār viṣṇuvarttaṉa
mahārājar viṇṇappattāl tirumeṉikku naṉṟāka In=ta somakrāṇa El⌈
vaiyil virutarājapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu tiruvayin=ti rapurattāḻvāṉuk
ku sarvvāyam Akappaṭa Utakapūrvvam paṇṇit tan=taruḷiṉa nilamāvatu naṭuvilnāṭāṉa rā
jentravaḷanāṭṭup pavittiramāṇikkavaḷanāṭṭu vākūrnāṭṭu vākūrāṉa Aḻakiyacoḻaccaruppetima
ṅkalattu niṉṟum virutarājapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭoṭe piṟin=tu virutarāja
payaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭut tiruvayintirapurattāḻvāṉukku 2 10 2Āvatiṉ Etirāmā
ṇṭumutal tirumaṭaippaḷḷippuṟamākavum tirunāṭkaḷil Eḻun=ta ruḷavum Ikkoyilil
nittam pattuk kalam tiruvakkiram Uṇṇakkaṭavitākavum sarvvāyam Akappaṭa
t taṉtaruḷiṉa nilattukku EllaiĀvatu Ivvūr coḻake
raḷappereri Uṭaiyerippaṭṭu nel viḷaintuvarukiṟa nilam
coḻakeraḷappererit toṭṭuvāykku vaṭakkum rājentracoḻappererikrai
kku meṟkum Ivverikaraikku teṟkum paranṛpaparākramavatikku kiḻakkum Ivvatikku meṟkum
coḻakeraḷappererit toṭṭuvāykku vaṭakkum rājentracoḻappererikkaraik
ku teṟkum centapirāṉvāykkāl paḻavāykkālukku kiḻakkum Āka Iṉṉāṉkel
laikkum Uṭpaṭṭa nilam 2 10li Ivvirupatiṟṟuveliyum Inta somakrāṇa Elvai
yil Iāḻvāṟku Utakapūrvvam paṇṇit tantaruḷiṉa nilattukku Uḷvarikku Eḻuttiṭ
ṭār Ivai puravaritiṇaiynāyakam kaḻumparuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai puravaritiṇaikkaḷanāyakam Aḻaki
yacuntara muventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai puravaritiṇaikkaḷattu mukaveṭṭi ceyaṅ
Digital edition of SII 7.760 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
